mapper.sql: essayId, essayname, description, essaysrc, onlin, teacherid, finishtime, adminId
mapper.select: SELECT essay.essayId as essayid,essay.essayname,essay.essaysrc,essay.description,essay.finishtime,essay.onlin,admin.adminId,admin.`name`,applybody.beginTime FROM essay,admin,applybody WHERE essay.adminId=admin.adminId AND applybody.essayId=essay.essayId AND applybody.beginTime < (NOW()+INTERVAL 8 HOUR)

SELECT essay.essayId as essayid,essay.essayname,essay.essaysrc,essay.description,essay.finishtime,essay.onlin,admin.adminId,admin.`name`,applybody.beginTime FROM essay,admin,applybody WHERE essay.adminId=admin.adminId AND applybody.essayId=essay.essayId AND applybody.beginTime>=(NOW()+INTERVAL 8 HOUR)

select
distinct
from essay
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into essay (essayId, essayname, description, essaysrc, onlin, teacherid, finishtime, adminId) values (#{essayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{essayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{essaysrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into essay
essayId,
essayname,
description,
essaysrc,
onlin,
teacherid,
finishtime,
adminId,

mapper.update:
update essay
essayId = #{record.essayid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
essayname = #{record.essayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
essaysrc = #{record.essaysrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
onlin = #{record.onlin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teacherid = #{record.teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finishtime = #{record.finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
adminId = #{record.adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update essay set essayId = #{record.essayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, essayname = #{record.essayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, essaysrc = #{record.essaysrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onlin = #{record.onlin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacherid = #{record.teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finishtime = #{record.finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adminId = #{record.adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update essay
essayname = #{essayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
essaysrc = #{essaysrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
onlin = #{onlin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
teacherid = #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
adminId = #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where essayId = #{essayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update essay set essayname = #{essayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, essaysrc = #{essaysrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onlin = #{onlin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teacherid = #{teacherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finishtime = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adminId = #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where essayId = #{essayid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
